appetizers.name: Mozzarella Sticks
appetizers.description: Mozzerella cheese covered in panko breadcrumbs and lightly fried

appetizers.name: Loaded Cheese Fries
appetizers.description: French fries smothered in cheese and bacon.

cold sandwiches.name: Tuna Fish Sandwich
cold sandwiches.description: Tuna fish mixed with mayo, celery, onion, lemon juice and salt and pepper on a fresh made italian roll.

cold sandwiches.name: Famous Italian Sub
cold sandwiches.description: Ham, salami and capicola on a fresh made italian roll topped with lettuce, tomatoes and oregano.

hot sandwiches.name: Mojo Pulled Pork Sandwich
hot sandwiches.description: Mojo marinated pork on a fresh made italian roll topped with green chiles and onions.

hot sandwiches.name: Philly Cheesesteak Sandwich
hot sandwiches.description: Chuck roast steak cooked with worcestershire sauce on a fresh made italian roll topped with onions, peppers and 2 types of cheese.

desserts.name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Ala Mode
desserts.description: Big warm chocolate chip cookie topped with whipped cream and chocolate syrup.

desserts.name: Zeppoles
desserts.description: Warm fried dough topped with powdered sugar with a side of chocolate syrup.

drinks.name: Strawberry Banana Smoothie
drinks.description: Pureed fresh fruit blended with ice.

drinks.name: Green Juice
drinks.description: Just the juice from a delicious combination of fruits and veggies.
